price: [Yoo na sobsiisan] qomti kiyya ni dhiphata. Arrabni kiyyas hin diriiru. Kanaafuu gara Haaruunitti ergi.
arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayaḍīqu ṣadrī walā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa-arsil ilā hārūna
